FuncDef: This command enables RIB prioritization for the OSPF/OSPFv3 protocol. When enabled at the OSPF interface level, all routes learned through the associated OSPF interface will be processed through the OSPF route calculation process at a higher priority.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the name of the prefix list which contains prefixes get high priority for RIB-download. The high priority prefixes are downloaded first to the RIB. In doing so, the convergence time for these prefixes is better.
